headline: ‘False News’ Comes True as Beijing Replaces Its Top Representative in Hong Kong
abstract: After months of protests and an electoral defeat for pro-Beijing political parties, an official with a record of difficult assignments is on the way.
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — The Chinese government abruptly replaced its top representative in Hong Kong on Saturday evening, installing a senior Communist Party official with a record of difficult assignments in inland provinces that involved working closely with the security services.
